organization.name: the name of the organization
organization.brief: a brief summary of the organization
organization.description: a detailed description of the organization

problems.name: a name for this problem
problems.description: One of the problems being addressed by this solution. do not include information about the organization in this problem statement.

stakeholders.name: the name of this stakeholder of the problem

organization.team: any information about the organization's team in paragraph form
organization.geography: a description of the geography context in which the organization operates and impacts through its operations in paragraph form
misc: Any additional context about the organization and its operations that did not fit in the previous sections
